        public Config(String file,
              String defaultConfigurationFile)
        Constructor that loads specific file augmented with defaults and the name of the default configuration file.
        Parameters:
        file - YAML file to load.
        defaultConfigurationFile - Default YAML file to load.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public Object get(String key)
        Looks up the key and returns the matching value or null if not.
        Parameters:
        key - The key to use
        Returns:
        value that the key maps to or null.

      • getOrDefault

        public Object getOrDefault(String key,
                           Object defaultValue)
        If there was a mapping for the key, the mapping is returned if not null, otherwise returns the defaultValue.
        Parameters:
        key - The key to get.
        defaultValue - The defaultValue to return if there is no mapping or the mapping is null.
        Returns:
        The value of the key or the defaultValue.

      • getAs

        public <T> T getAs(String key,
                   Class<T> clazz)
        Get a value from the config as a particular type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the config.
        Parameters:
        key - The name of the config.
        clazz - The Class of the type.
        Returns:
        The config as the particular type or null.
        Throws:
        ClassCastException - if the value of the config could not be casted to the type.

      • getOrDefaultAs

        public <T> T getOrDefaultAs(String key,
                            T defaultValue,
                            Class<T> clazz)
        Get a value from the config as a particular type or default to a provided value.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the config.
        Parameters:
        key - The name of the config.
        defaultValue - A default of the same type to use if the config was not found.
        clazz - The Class of the type.
        Returns:
        The config or your default value as the particular type.
        Throws:
        ClassCastException - if the value of the config or default could not be casted to the type.

      • getRequiredConfigAs

        public <T> T getRequiredConfigAs(String key,
                                 Class<T> clazz)
        Get a value from the config as a particular type or throw an exception with a message if not found.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the config.
        Parameters:
        key - The name of the config.
        clazz - The Class of the type.
        Returns:
        The config as the particular type.
        Throws:
        ClassCastException - if the value of the config could not be casted to the type.
        NullPointerException - if the config was not found.

      • getAll

        public Map<String,Object> getAll(Optional<Set<String>> keys)
        Gets all mappings for a set of keys. If no keys are specified, all mappings are returned.
        Parameters:
        keys - an Optional Set of mapping names.
        Returns:
        a mapping (non-backing) of keys if present, or all the mappings.

      • getAllWithPrefix

        public Map<String,Object> getAllWithPrefix(Optional<Set<String>> keys,
                                           String prefix,
                                           boolean stripPrefix)
        Get mappings for all keys with the specified prefix. If stripPrefix is set, the output keys do not contain the prefix.
        Parameters:
        keys - an Optional Set of mapping names.
        prefix - The prefix that relevant keys must contain.
        stripPrefix - If true, the output keys do not contain the prefix.
        Returns:
        mapping for keys (or all keys in data, if keys is empty) with the prefix.

      • getAllBut

        public Map<String,Object> getAllBut(Optional<Set<String>> keys)
        Gets all mappings other than a set of keys. If no keys are specified, all mappings are returned.
        Parameters:
        keys - an Optional Set of mapping names.
        Returns:
        a mapping (non-backing) of keys if present, or all the mappings.

                Object value)
        Adds a key/value pair to the configuration.
        Parameters:

        value - to use

      • merge

        public void merge(Config other)
        Merges another Config into this one.
        Parameters:
        other - The other Config to merge into this one.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears out the configuration.

      • readYAML

        protected Map<String,Object> readYAML(String yamlFile)
        Reads a YAML file containing mappings and returns them as a Map.
        Parameters:
        yamlFile - The String name of the YAML resource file in classpath or the path to a YAML file containing the mappings.
        Returns:
        A Map of String names to Objects of the mappings in the YAML file.
